item.title: Door-knock prank leaves 10-year-old boy shot, homeowner detained
item.description: A 10-year-old Houston boy was shot and critically injured when he allegedly attempted a door-knocking prank on a neighbor house, police said.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump plans to issue executive order to require voter ID
item.description: But Trump did say a trilateral meeting "will happen" without specifying when.
